rulesStrings.li: questDescription->Two young wanderers, [boy_nameFull] and [girl_nameFull] have arrived at our colony's gates.\nBound not by blood but by a shared history of loss and survival, they have journeyed through perilous landscapes, evading threats both human and natural in search of a sanctuary.\nWill we extend our compassion and resources to help them or prioritize our colony's safety and stability by turning them away?

li.label: open arms
li.description: This colony, this sanctuary, is where our past sorrows can finally rest.

li.label: a fleeting haven
li.description: This temporary refuge offers us a rare moment of peace and safety. It's a bittersweet feeling, knowing we must leave soon.

li.label: turned away
li.description: Standing at the closed gates, the rejection stings sharply, a familiar echo of our journey's solitude.
